title: Super Mario no Shouboutai
synopsis: An obscure anime video animated by Toei that also functions as a fire safety Public Service Announcement. Very little is known about the video and details regarding distribution, plot and character names can only be deduced by the video itself.
related_anime: ['Amada Anime Series: Super Mario Brothers', 'Super Mario Brothers: Peach-hime Kyuushutsu Daisakusen!']
